component.name: MainScene
component.script:
sub init() m.top.backgroundColor = "0x000000"
video = CreateObject("roSGNode", "Video") video.width = 1920 video.height = 1080 video.translation = [0, 0] video.control = "play" video.visible = true
content = CreateObject("roSGNode", "ContentNode") content.url = "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/icontvusa/icon-tv-roku/main/icon-tv-coming-soon.mp4" content.streamFormat = "mp4"
video.content = content m.top.appendChild(video) end sub
